modName: Bliss - Racemenu Preset with UUNP Bodyslide - DELETED
summary: Bliss is a Racemenu preset of an elf. There's also an UUNP Bodyslide to fit along the preset.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/am4zWRE.jpg[/img]

"She's gentle as a snowflake touching your nose,
...and has a personality as sharp as ice."


[color=#a2c4c9][b]Download Mirage[/b] [b]Installers[/b][/color]
• Bliss - Racemenu Preset
• Bliss - Ecstasy Bodyslide Preset (UUNP)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#a2c4c9]Mods Needed For Customization[/color]

[/b]• [u]Install[/u]: DIMONIZED UNP female body﻿ (or variant).
﻿
• [u]Install[/u]: Fair Skin Complexion (UNP)
* I use Optimized, but the other UNP one should be fine.
* Use all assets: body textures, brows, eyes, etc.

• [u]Install[/u]: SG Female Textures Renewal, plus Options (install after main file).
* UNP Textures (Main File) -> 2K/4k Scar Textures -> Wet Body Textures

• [u]Install[/u]: KS Hairdos Renewal
• [u]Install[/u]: The Eyes Of Beauty
• [u]Install[/u]: Brows
• [u]Install[/u]: Ravens Warpaint (Standalone 11-13)
• [u]Install[/u]: The Coenaculi
• [u]Install[/u]: Freckle Mania 1

• Set up Bliss Ecstasy in Bodyslider before clicking the play button, if you want to use it.
* I do recommend it, as I made it to go with her Racemenu preset.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#a2c4c9][b]In-Game[/b][/color]
• Set your character's race to Nord.
• Load up the Ecstasy preset.[/center]﻿



[center]﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/S8KrbhM.jpg[/img]

Without these wonderful people, making their assets available, we designers wouldn't exist to make presets (or simply design a
character for the next screenshot). A big thank you to all of them.

[/url]
[u]Other Assets and Tools Used[/u]:
Aether Suite
Face Light
DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field
﻿Halo’s Poser S1.7

﻿_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[size=2]• Do not create a follower mod of Bliss and upload it to Nexusmods or elsewhere. If I feel that a follower is to be of her, then
I'll post it on Nexusmods myself and only here, going through the correct channels.[/size]

[size=2]• Permission is given to use my Bliss Preset and [size=2]Bliss Ecstasy[/size] Bodyslides for your personal appearance only, well as any
images taken of Bliss by me, posted on this page. If you want to craft yourself your own Bliss follower, for YOUR use
only, then that's fine. If you would like to use the [size=2]Bliss Ecstasy[/size] Bodyslide for another follower of yours, then all I ask is
to credit me and everything will be fine from there. You don't have to ask me to use it. Otherwise, personal use only as stated.
Do not upload the [size=2]Bliss Ecstasy[/size] Bodyslide with your follower installation, either, please. Link the user here.

[size=2]• [/size]Uploading the Bliss Preset and Ecstasy Bodyslide to other avenues is prohibited, well as trying to make any sort of income.
The [size=2]Bliss[/size] Preset and Bliss Ecstasy Bodyslide will only exist on Nexusmods, Forever Free, as it should be.

[size=2][size=2]• [/size][/size]Any imagery with text on it, shown in the header or on this description
page, isn't to be used for your own work — its for this page only.[/size][/center]
author: avamods
